title: The Nation’s Destruction due to the Annulment of the Fox-possessed Lady’s Engagement - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Depictions of Cruelty   Evil Gods   Evil Protagonist   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Goddesses   Oneshot   Royalty   Yandere
author: nullpovendman
description:
Duchess Azu, who was perfect except for being possessed by a fox, was kept at a distance by her fiancée, the prince, because of her fox ears. 

The prince, who disliked Azu, eventually became friendly with Viscount Naiya, and at the school graduation party, he foolishly announced the annulment of his engagement to the Duchess. The prince, however, did not know what his decision would lead to.

Everything comes to an end when the promise made between Azu and his country is fulfilled.
>
